name: a buggy gaem
description:
An engaging and fun platforme--oh, wait, what? Really? The developer didn't even bother to fix such a basic bug? Guess you'll have to fix it yourself.

Fix bugs! Literally! Find bugs, catch bugs, and fix this buggy game!

Features:

  • An inconsistent art style!
  • A debug log which shouldn't need to be there, but which is nevertheless there because you'll need it!
  • Recycled assets, and free assets from online!
  • Multiple endings, none of which will totally bug out at all!
  • A player character which is literally just a square!
  • No animations whatsoever!
  • Multiple bugs which affect gameplay AND aesthetic! 2 for 1!!
  • Insufferable and unskippable dialogue for less than 10 characters! I think? I can't count? I think it was less than 10, anyway!
  • Platformer puzzles which probably weren't playtested enough!
  • Me projecting all my tears and shame at being a horribly unskilled person!
  • and more!

※ It's actually (and shockingly) impossible to softlock yourself, so don't worry too much about it.
